metadata.title: CVE-2023-48945 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A stack overflow in openlink virtuoso-opensource v7.2.11 allows attackersto cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted SQL statements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
